metadata.Title: CVE-2022-42927 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A same-origin policy violation could have allowed the theft of cross-originURL entries, leaking the result of a redirect, via`performance.getEntries()`. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 106,Firefox ESR < 102.4, and Thunderbird < 102.4.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
